translations: n.让步，妥协；特许权；<英>优惠价，减价；商铺；小摊卖的东西；认输

phrs.translation: 特许经营权合约；租让制合同

sentences.sentence: He was ready to make a concession.
She made no concession to his age; she expected him to work as hard as she did.
sentences.translation: 她丝毫也不体谅他的年龄，要求他干得像她一样卖力。

sentences.sentence: Finish the following sentence with an adverbial clause of concession.
sentences.translation: 用让步状语从句完成下列句子。
